mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scenic_area(scenic_area_name, scenic_area_introduce, scenic_area_longitude, scenic_area_dimension, scenic_area_score) VALUES ("${scenicArea.scenicareaname}", "${scenicArea.scenicareaintroduce}", ${scenicArea.scenicarealongitude},${scenicArea.scenicareadimension}, ${scenicArea.scenicareascore})
